title: American Sociological Review - When Religion Hurts: Structural Sexism and Health in Religious Congregations

description: Authors Patricia Homan and Amy Burdette discuss their article, "When Religion Hurts: Structural Sexism and Health in Religious Congregations," published in the April 2021 issue of American Sociological Review.
